isis.stitle: ELECTRICAL SYSTEM TROUBLESHOOTING GUIDE - 9800 - WEST COAST MAGNUM MIRRORS AND AERO MIRRORS - WEST COAST AND AERO MIRROR COMMON SERVICE PROCEDURES

svcsubsec.title: WEST COAST AND AERO MIRROR COMMON SERVICE PROCEDURES

step1.para: At the upper mounting plate loosen (2) mounting bolts that attach mirror bracket to the door. DO NOT remove the bolts at this time.
At the lower mounting use a flat blade screwdriver to remove the plastic cover.
Locate and cut the wire tie securing the wire harness to the mounting bracket.
Disconnect the mirror wire harness and CB antenna wire.
Remove (4) mounting bolts from the lower mounting bracket. Do not damage the ground strap.
Stabilize the "C" loop and remove (2) upper mounting bolts. Remove "C" loop from door.
Do not damage or discard the upper and lower isolator pads.
